snippet: Despite a drop in earnings, the health care products giant raised its 2012 outlook.
abstract: Johnson & Johnson reports that its third-quarter profit fell 7 percent as litigation and acquisition costs and factory upgrade expenses offset higher medicine and medical device sales; despite drop in earnings, company raises its 2012 profit forecast.
lead_paragraph: Despite a drop in earnings, the health care products giant raised its 2012 outlook.

headline.seo: Johnson and Johnson Profit Falls, but Beats Estimates
headline.main: J.&J.’s Costs Take a Toll on Its Profit
headline.print_headline: J.&J.’s Costs Take a Toll On Its Profit
